sn36.18:1.1: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu …pe…
sn36.18:1.2: ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagava etadavoca:
sn36.18:1.3: “katama nu kho, bhikkhave, vedana, katamo vedanasamudayo, katamo vedananirodho, katama vedananirodhagamini patipada?
sn36.18:1.4: Ko vedanaya assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranan”ti?
sn36.18:1.7: sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana—
